And when they’re ready to take on a new career path, we’re right there with them, giving them the guidance and momentum into the best future they envision.
 
Role Name: Process Manager, GMNS Marketing Operations -Point of Purchase (POP) Support
Purpose:  Effectively and efficiently drive POP customer service, budgeting, reporting & forecasting.
Function Description: 
Global Services Group (GSG) brings together the company’s external and internal servicing functions to provide best in class servicing to our customers and colleagues.
 
Emerging as the Enterprise Sales Operations & Business Enablement utility, SABE (Sales & Business Enablement) drives standardization & agility for the organization. Sales Operations includes Pre-sales, acquisition & Account Management while Business Enablement includes Marketing, Platform & Capabilities.
 
Point of Purchase Signage is fundamental to drive Perception of Coverage, Activation, and Welcomed Acceptance. The product set is comprised of 70+ physical and digital assets for merchants and partners to access free of charge, in addition to select premium items that merchants can order at a discounted price through 3rd party supplier partnerships. SABE POP Support team will work very closely with GMNS Marketing POP team to drive POP customer service, budgeting, reporting & forecasting. 
 
Responsibilities:

Support POP mailbox and respond and resolve all customer, merchant, and vendor queries in a timely manner within the defined SLA
Proactively involve and interact with multiple stakeholders (via email, chat, and phone) to cater to complex business needs and bring them to a logical conclusion.
Consolidate daily and Adhoc POP orders into system for vendor processing and follow up on order status.
Requests include but are not limited to: checking order status with vendors, providing consultation on POP item suitability, assessing and responding to exception requests, providing guidance on POP guidelines, custom POP requests
Review and validate monthly invoices submitted by vendors for accuracy.
Regular communication with the business, merchants, and vendor partner to update with the operational activities and develop high end reports for the partners
Communication with global business partners to understand changes in process and implementing process changes in-house
Support on ad hoc analysis and reporting, and troubleshooting outstanding issues
Transform excel based reporting to a better visualization tool such as Tableau.
Formulate and communicate strategies in a clear and compelling way
Manage customer expectations including scope, schedule, changes, capacity and problem resolution\ 
Drive high engagement with customers to ensure on-time, high quality deliverables

Critical Factors to Success (Outcome Driven):
Business Outcomes:

Run the POP store smoothly and provide best customer experience to our external (merchants) and internal customers (colleagues) 
Ready to suggest and develop various process improvements required in the existing processes

 
Leadership Outcomes:

Demonstrate learning agility, make decisions quickly and with the highest level of integrity
Able to communicate effectively and interpret stakeholder’s expectations 
Able to propose and implement solutions to create process efficiency

 
Past Experience 
3-5 Years’ experience in customer service and query resolution, budget management, purchase order and invoice processing, basic MIS reporting, good hands on experience in excel
